--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Megatron still stood in front of the Obylisk, waiting for some sort 
of
> sign of life, when his vision failed him. What is this? he thought, 
is
> my internal circuitry malfunctioning? Then he was filled with a 
message,
> Brother? Don't Trust? 
> 
> "I trust no one." Megatron shouted outloud, through gritted teeth, 
as
> his vision returned, and he realised that there must be something 
wrong
> with his optics, as nothing eventful had happened.


::DOMNIJOE AND BLINDCHAOS::

    Both the triple changher and Domnijoe were relaxing back in HQ 
when they heared megatron's shout. They curiously clambered to his 
side and watched him warily.
    "Boss?" Blindchaos asked, his grin soft. "Everything ok?' His tone 
was decisively...tender. It was an odd tone comming from a warrior!

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
